markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Venom Purge](/Feats.aspx?ID=4034) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Vishkanya" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=369" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 63</row>

**Frequency**
once per day

**Prerequisites**
Trained in [Medicine](/Skills.aspx?ID=9)

</column>

---

You produce a specialized venom that burns out other toxins and impurities in your body. For each [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46) or [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126) currently affecting you, attempt a Medicine check to [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) that disease or poison. As normal, your counteract level is equal to half your level rounded up.
name: Venom Purge
